Image.Text: Here's a hint. You'll gain atomic mass from winning battles. When you have enough atomic mass, your chemical will gain an additional Carbon and Level Up! [row] Want to know more?

Most organic chemical compounds can combust, a reaction that requires oxygen. Complete Combustion will yield higher damage than Incomplete Combustion, so manage your available oxygen properly! [row] Want to know more?

Some chemical reactions, like Free Radical Substitution, requires reactants beyond Oxygen. These reactants will already need to be in your ITEMS backpack when you go into battle! [row] Want to know more?
Alkene/Ethene: Man, looks like you really need help. I'll join your party!
Go on ahead! You'll reach the City of Chemists soon. By the way, there's no turning back after this point.
